meanings.definition: A noun meaning a type of tree or shrub.
meanings.sent1: The ambaries in the park provide shade for picnics.
meanings.sent2: I planted some ambaries in my garden to attract butterflies.
meanings.sent3: The squirrels love to climb the ambaries and play hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent4: The ambaries stood tall like guardians of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The sweet scent of the ambaries filled the air with tranquility.

meanings.definition: A verb meaning to gather or collect.
meanings.sent1: She likes to ambaries seashells during her beach walks.
meanings.sent2: We need to ambaries all the data before the meeting.
meanings.sent3: He would ambaries coins from different countries as a hobby.
meanings.sent4: The children would ambaries colorful leaves for their art project.
meanings.sent5: The farmer would ambaries his crops before the harvest season.

meanings.definition: An adjective meaning relating to or resembling amber.
meanings.sent1: The ambaries jewelry sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: Her eyes had an ambaries glow in the dimly lit room.
meanings.sent3: The ambaries vase added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky with ambaries hues.
meanings.sent5: The ambaries gemstone was passed down through generations.
